articles.content: Playing World of Warcraft gives a player lots of choices and quests, which in theory is fantastic. However, over the games many expansions, the formula occasionally fails to work out. Some people lik… [+1706 chars]

articles.title: 2023 Porsche 911 Sport Classic Debuts With 543 HP, RWD, And A Manual - Motor1
articles.description: The Porsche 911 Sport Classic combines retro styling cues with 543 horsepower that only goes to the rear wheels through a seven-speed manual transmission.
articles.content:
Update: We incorrectly listed the horsepower rating as 563. The correct rating is 543. We apologize for the error.
